text.section: In §§ 14-801 through 14-854 of this subtitle, the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Other taxing agency" means any municipal corporation or other public or quasi-public corporation that may impose a tax of any kind which is or may become a lien on real property.

section.section: "Tax" means any tax, or charge of any kind due to the State or any of its political subdivisions, or to any other taxing agency, that by law is a lien against the real property on which it is imposed or assessed.
"Tax" includes interest, penalties, and service charges.
